isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT

svcsubproc.title: Install Bunk/Storage Unit on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 101 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide driver side seat all the way forward to allow installation of bunk/storage unit (Item 4) into the cab.
Turn bunk/storage unit on it's side and install into cab through passenger side door opening. Position bunk/storage unit (Item 4) over the four threaded studs in cab floor.
Position seat belts (Item 7) over mounting holes in rear floor mat (Item 8) and cab floor and install torx head bolts (Item 6). Tighten to 25 to 35 Lbf-ft (34 to 47.5 N•m).

note.para: Seat belt attachment will allow seat belt to swivel after mounting bolt is fully torqued.

step1.para: With the bunk/storage unit (Item 4) positioned over the mounting studs in the cab floor. Install four hex flanged nuts (Item 5), two each end. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.8 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Position bunk mattress (Item 3) onto bunk/storage unit (Item 4).
If so equipped, install protective plate (Item 1) over both rear passenger seat threaded mounting studs (Item 2) in cab floor.

Install passenger bucket seat or fixed passenger seat, refer to
SEATS
. For installing passenger bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
